sub_fields.label: File (for autoplay)
sub_fields.name: file
sub_fields.instructions: Used when autoplay is enabled. Supports video and image files.

sub_fields.label: Video Title
sub_fields.name: video_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title that will appear in the video modal

sub_fields.label: Poster Image
sub_fields.name: poster_image
sub_fields.instructions: Thumbnail image shown before video plays

sub_fields.label: Video Embed
sub_fields.name: video_embed
sub_fields.instructions: YouTube, Vimeo, or other video embed URL

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: quote
sub_fields.instructions: Please do not include quote symbols

sub_fields.label: Autoplay (video only)
sub_fields.name: autoplay
sub_fields.instructions: If enabled, video will play automatically (requires HTML5 video file). If disabled, video will open in a modal when clicked (requires embed URL).

sub_fields.label: Media File (for autoplay or images)
sub_fields.name: media
sub_fields.instructions: Used when autoplay is enabled or for static images. Supports video and image files.

sub_fields.label: Video Title
sub_fields.name: video_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title that will appear in the video modal

sub_fields.label: Poster Image
sub_fields.name: poster_image
sub_fields.instructions: Thumbnail image shown before video plays

sub_fields.label: Video Embed
sub_fields.name: video_embed
sub_fields.instructions: YouTube, Vimeo, or other video embed URL
